Articles.Content:
Lightweight payload? Energia lifter? No... We can use Aista instead. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

**Buran-Aista**

[http://www.kerbalx.com/luizopiloto/Buran-Aista](http://www.kerbalx.com/luizopiloto/Buran-Aista)

![k2bjhPt.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/k2bjhPt.jpg)

> 
> Woah! How does that fly?! ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

Krussian Technology... :3

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-09T04:35:18Z" title="03/09/2015 04:35  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 9, 2015</time> by luizopiloto**
That looks awesome. ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif) Have you tried making an An-225 carrying a Buran?
no... But you can refuel it with liquid fuel only. It can fly by itself... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
